item.title: Trump doubles steel tariffs to 50%, touts U.S. Steel-Nippon deal still short on details
item.description: The president said he is doubling duties on steel imports while talking up U.S. Steel’s deal with the Japanese company.

item.title: S&P 500 scores best May since 1990, but stocks end month with fresh tariff worries
item.description: U.S. stocks roared back in May as global trade tensions eased, but tariff-related developments around the month’s end suggest a smooth climb from here...

item.title: ‘You are going to panic,’ Jamie Dimon tells regulators about what will happen when the bond market cracks
item.description: The bond market is on edge, but less so this week after smooth Treasury auctions and talk of a key banking reform this summer.

item.title: A pivotal OPEC+ decision this weekend could tank crude-oil prices by 10%
item.description: A decision by major oil producers this weekend could pull prices for crude down to their lowest levels since 2021, with demand tough to gauge against ...

item.title: U.S.-China trade talks: Why rare-earth minerals are a sticking point in getting back on track
item.description: Component of cellphones and EVs is a thorn in negotiations.
